model.comment: BlocD8 can be programmed in the usual way

label.label: Note: Changes to Option CVs are not recognized until BlocD8 power is cycled.

display.tooltip: Required for ops mode
Sets the Ops Mode address

label.label: This is the same as a Loco address
Send input state at power on
Send primary input state at Digitrax interrogation request
